description.zh-cn: 汉武帝刘彻的第二任皇后，在位38年。她是卫青的同母异父姐姐，霍去病的姨母，戾太子刘据的生母，汉宣帝的曾祖母。
description.en: The second empress of Emperor Wu of Han (Liu Che), reigning for 38 years. She was the half-sister of Wei Qing, the maternal aunt of Huo Qubing, the mother of Crown Prince Liu Ju, and the great-grandmother of Emperor Xuan of Han.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝第七位皇帝，卫子夫的丈夫。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Han Dynasty, husband of Wei Zifu.

description.zh-cn: 卫子夫、卫青等人的母亲，曾为平阳侯府中的婢女。
description.en: Mother of Wei Zifu, Wei Qing, and others. She was a servant in the household of the Marquis of Pingyang.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期将领，卫子夫的同母异父弟弟。
description.en: A general of the Western Han Dynasty, and the younger half-brother of Wei Zifu.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝与卫子夫的长子，被立为太子，后在巫蛊之祸中兵败自杀。
description.en: The eldest son of Emperor Wu of Han and Wei Zifu. He was installed as Crown Prince but was defeated and committed suicide during the Witchcraft Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期将领，卫子夫的外甥，卫少儿之子。
description.en: A general of the Western Han Dynasty, nephew of Wei Zifu, and son of Wei Shao'er.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝之女，汉武帝的姐姐。她将卫子夫献给汉武帝。
description.en: Daughter of Emperor Jing of Han and elder sister of Emperor Wu of Han. She presented Wei Zifu to Emperor Wu.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第四代平阳侯，平阳公主的丈夫。
description.en: The fourth-generation Marquis of Pingyang during the Western Han Dynasty, husband of Princess Pingyang.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝的第一任皇后，因行巫蛊之事被废黜。
description.en: The first empress of Emperor Wu of Han, who was deposed for practicing witchcraft.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝之女，孝武陈皇后的母亲。因嫉妒卫子夫，曾企图绑架卫青。
description.en: Daughter of Emperor Wen of Han and mother of Empress Chen. Out of jealousy towards Wei Zifu, she attempted to kidnap Wei Qing.

description.zh-cn: 西汉将领，卫青的好友，曾解救被绑架的卫青。
description.en: A general of the Western Han Dynasty and a friend of Wei Qing, who rescued him from an abduction.

description.zh-cn: 西汉酷吏，曾负责查办陈皇后巫蛊案。
description.en: A harsh official of the Western Han Dynasty, known for investigating the witchcraft case of Empress Chen.

description.zh-cn: 发生于汉武帝征和二年（前91年）的一场政治动乱，因巫蛊而起，导致太子刘据、皇后卫子夫等众多皇室成员及大臣被杀或自杀。
description.en: A political turmoil that occurred in 91 BC (the second year of the Zhenghé era) during the reign of Emperor Wu of Han. It was triggered by witchcraft allegations and resulted in the deaths or suicides of many imperial family members and officials, including Crown Prince Liu Ju and Empress Wei Zifu.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝时期的官员，在巫蛊之祸中与太子刘据结怨，后被刘据起兵诛杀。
description.en: An official during the reign of Emperor Wu of Han. He made an enemy of Crown Prince Liu Ju during the Witchcraft Rebellion and was subsequently killed by troops led by the prince.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝第十位皇帝，卫子夫的曾孙。即位后为卫子夫恢复名誉并追谥为“思后”。
description.en: The tenth emperor of the Han Dynasty and the great-grandson of Wei Zifu. After ascending the throne, he restored her reputation and posthumously honored her as 'Empress Si'.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期地名，位于今山西临汾，是卫子夫的出生地。
description.en: A location during the Western Han Dynasty, located in modern-day Linfen, Shanxi. It is the birthplace of Wei Zifu.

description.zh-cn: 西汉都城，卫子夫逝世于此。
description.en: The capital of the Western Han Dynasty, where Wei Zifu died.

description.zh-cn: 西汉平阳侯曹时与平阳公主的府邸。卫子夫曾是府中的歌姬。
description.en: The residence of Marquis Cao Shi of Pingyang and Princess Pingyang during the Western Han Dynasty. Wei Zifu was once a singer in this household.

description.zh-cn: 卫子夫的二姐，霍去病之母。
description.en: The second elder sister of Wei Zifu and the mother of Huo Qubing.

description.zh-cn: 霍去病之父。
description.en: Father of Huo Qubing.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝与卫子夫之女，在巫蛊之祸中被杀害。
description.en: Daughter of Emperor Wu of Han and Wei Zifu, who was killed in the Witchcraft Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 西汉史学家，《史记》作者。他在《史记自敍》中称赞卫子夫品德良好。
description.en: A historian of the Western Han Dynasty and the author of 'Records of the Grand Historian'. He praised Wei Zifu for her good character in the postface of his work.

description.zh-cn: 一种利用巫术诅咒害人的行为。在汉武帝时期，与巫蛊相关的指控引发了严重的政治迫害，如废黜陈皇后及后来的巫蛊之祸。
description.en: A form of witchcraft used to curse and harm people. During the reign of Emperor Wu of Han, accusations related to witchcraft led to severe political persecutions, such as the deposition of Empress Chen and the later Witchcraft Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 与陈皇后勾结，暗行巫蛊之事的巫女。
description.en: A witch who colluded with Empress Chen to practice witchcraft.

description.zh-cn: 卫子夫于公元前139年入宫，公元前128年被立为皇后，是汉武帝刘彻的第二任皇后。
description.en: Wei Zifu entered the palace in 139 BC and was made empress in 128 BC, becoming the second empress of Emperor Wu of Han (Liu Che).

description.zh-cn: 卫子夫是卫媪的女儿。
description.en: Wei Zifu is the daughter of Wei Ao.

description.zh-cn: 刘据是卫子夫的儿子。
description.en: Liu Ju is the son of Wei Zifu.

description.zh-cn: 刘据是汉武帝刘彻的儿子。
description.en: Liu Ju is the son of Emperor Wu of Han (Liu Che).

description.zh-cn: 诸邑公主是卫子夫的女儿。
description.en: Princess Zhuyi is the daughter of Wei Zifu.

description.zh-cn: 卫子夫是卫青的同母异父姐姐。
description.en: Wei Zifu is the elder half-sister of Wei Qing (same mother, different father).

description.zh-cn: 卫子夫是卫少儿的妹妹。
description.en: Wei Zifu is the younger sister of Wei Shao'er.

description.zh-cn: 霍去病是卫少儿的儿子。
description.en: Huo Qubing is the son of Wei Shao'er.

description.zh-cn: 霍去病是霍仲孺的儿子。
description.en: Huo Qubing is the son of Huo Zhongru.

description.zh-cn: 汉宣帝是卫子夫的曾孙。
description.en: Emperor Xuan of Han is the great-grandson of Wei Zifu.

description.zh-cn: 卫子夫出生于平阳（今山西临汾）。
description.en: Wei Zifu was born in Pingyang (modern-day Linfen, Shanxi).

description.zh-cn: 平阳公主将卫子夫献给汉武帝，使其入宫并获得宠幸。
description.en: Princess Pingyang presented Wei Zifu to Emperor Wu of Han, which allowed her to enter the palace and gain his favor.

description.zh-cn: 卫子夫在入宫前是平阳公主府中的歌姬。
description.en: Before entering the palace, Wei Zifu was a singer in the household of Princess Pingyang.

description.zh-cn: 在卫子夫入宫并怀孕后，时任皇后的陈氏对其十分妒恨。
description.en: After Wei Zifu entered the palace and became pregnant, Empress Chen, who held the title at the time, became extremely jealous of her.

description.zh-cn: 为报复卫子夫，陈皇后的母亲馆陶公主刘嫖企图绑架并杀害卫青。
description.en: To retaliate against Wei Zifu, Empress Chen's mother, Princess Guantao (Liu Piao), attempted to abduct and kill Wei Qing.

description.zh-cn: 在卫青被馆陶公主绑架后，公孙敖等人将其成功解救。
description.en: After Wei Qing was abducted by Princess Guantao, Gongsun Ao and others successfully rescued him.

description.zh-cn: 酷吏张汤负责查办陈皇后勾结巫女楚服行巫蛊之事，最终导致陈皇后被废黜。
description.en: The harsh official Zhang Tang was in charge of investigating Empress Chen's collusion with the witch Chu Fu to practice witchcraft, which ultimately led to the empress's deposition.

description.zh-cn: 陈皇后因勾结巫女楚服暗行巫蛊之事而被废黜。
description.en: Empress Chen was deposed for colluding with the witch Chu Fu to secretly practice witchcraft.

description.zh-cn: 陈皇后勾结巫女楚服暗行巫蛊之事。
description.en: Empress Chen colluded with the witch Chu Fu to secretly practice witchcraft.

description.zh-cn: 卫子夫生下汉武帝长子刘据后，被立为皇后。
description.en: After giving birth to Emperor Wu's eldest son, Liu Ju, Wei Zifu was made Empress.

description.zh-cn: 在巫蛊之祸中，汉武帝派人收缴皇后印玺，卫子夫在使者到来前绝望自杀。
description.en: During the Witchcraft Rebellion, Emperor Wu sent officials to confiscate the empress's seal, leading a desperate Wei Zifu to commit suicide before their arrival.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝在巫蛊之祸中派遣官员收缴卫子夫的皇后印玺，意图废后，此举直接导致了卫子夫的自杀。
description.en: During the Witchcraft Rebellion, Emperor Wu of Han dispatched officials to confiscate Empress Wei Zifu's seal with the intention of deposing her, an act that directly led to her suicide.

description.zh-cn: 太子刘据在巫蛊之祸中起兵失败后自杀。
description.en: Crown Prince Liu Ju committed suicide after his uprising failed during the Witchcraft Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 诸邑公主因受巫蛊牵连而被诛杀。
description.en: Princess Zhuyi was executed due to her involvement in the witchcraft allegations.

description.zh-cn: 在巫蛊之祸中，太子刘据起兵诛杀了被他视为奸臣的江充。
description.en: During the Witchcraft Rebellion, Crown Prince Liu Ju raised troops and executed Jiang Chong, whom he regarded as a treacherous minister.

description.zh-cn: 在巫蛊之祸中，太子刘据起兵对抗汉武帝的军队。
description.en: During the Witchcraft Rebellion, Crown Prince Liu Ju raised troops to fight against the army of Emperor Wu of Han.

description.zh-cn: 汉宣帝即位后，为曾祖母卫子夫恢复名誉，追尊其谥号为“思后”。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Xuan of Han restored the reputation of his great-grandmother Wei Zifu and posthumously honored her with the title 'Empress Si'.

description.zh-cn: 史学家司马迁在其著作《史记》中称赞卫子夫品德良好。
description.en: The historian Sima Qian praised Wei Zifu for her good character in his work, 'Records of the Grand Historian'.
